titleInfo.title: Parallel Implementation of Neural Associative Memories on RISC Processors
VLSI for Neural Networks and Artificial Intelligence

bibliographicCitation.apa: Rückert, U., Rüping, S., & Naroska, E. (1994). Parallel Implementation of Neural Associative Memories on RISC Processors. In J. G. Delgado-Frias & W. R. Moore (Eds.), VLSI for Neural Networks and Artificial Intelligence (pp. 167-176). New York: Plenum Press.
